Posts.EditableText:
I am new to the site. I figured out pretty much everything except how to place images and such. I've looked at the tutorial video and it shows a bowers slot for images. But I don't have that anywhere on my panel. Do I need to download something or has the site been updated with another way of putting these things in?

Thanks.
